com.rjrudin.marklogic.appdeployer

Class ConfigDir

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rjrudin.marklogic.appdeployer.ConfigDir

  • public class ConfigDir
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines all of the directories where configuration files can be found. This is decoupled from the NounManager classes, who don't need to care where to look for configuration files, they just need to care about how to load the data in those files. Every directory path referenced in this should have a setter so that it can be modified in e.g. a Gradle build file.
